Package com.brycethuilot.auto_mailer

Class Policy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brycethuilot.auto_mailer.Policy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NarragansettBay, OceanHarbor
    public abstract class Policy
extends java.lang.Object
    Policy is the abstract base class for spefic policy types by company to extend from It is used to read a policy from a PDF and extract its contents, update the policy in QQ Catalyst, Send to the insured and print for a mortgagee Currently when extracting information from the PDF it can read
    • Insured name
    • Company name
    • Insured address
    • Policy number
    • Expiration and Effective Dates
    • Coverages
    • premium
    • Deductibles
    • If it is a dwelling policy
    • If it is a renewal or not
    It is abstract so that the other classes can implement the specifics for different companies policy types and how they format their PDFs differently but can provide an interface for ApplicationWindow to call the updateOnQQ() mailToInsured(ApplicationWindow) and printMortgagee() functions regardless of company
    Since:
    1.0
